## Chen Notation

```{dot}
//| echo: false
graph ER {
    fontname="Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif"
    node [fontname="Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif"]
    edge [fontname="Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif"]
    layout=neato
    node [shape=box]; zipcode; education; transportation; population; houseMarket; jobSecurity; criminalActivity;
    node [shape=ellipse]; {node [label="diversity"] }
    {node [label="zipCode"] }
        
    node [shape=diamond,style=filled,color=lightgrey]; "with"; "carries"; "own";"retains";"having"; "has"; 
    
    zipcode -- "with" [label="1",len=1.00];
    "with" -- education [label="n",len=1.00];
    
    zipcode -- "having" [label="1",len=1.00];
    "having" -- transportation [label="n",len=1.00];
    
    zipcode -- "retains" [label="1",len=1.00];
    "retains" -- houseMarket [label="n",len=1.00];

    zipcode -- "own" [label="1",len=1.00];
    "own" -- population [label="n",len=1.00];
    
    zipcode -- "carries" [label="1",len=1.00];
    "carries" -- jobSecurity [label="n",len=1.00];
   
    zipcode -- "has" [label="1",len=1.00];
    "has" -- criminalActivity [label="n",len=1.00];
  

    fontsize=20;

}
```
